page.title: 12 SCHOOLS IN THE EXNING AREA
page.content: The four schools surveyed were Exning Primary,Laureate Primary,Scaltback Middle and Newmarket Upper.There are obviously great differences between the schools and the way they work. AGE:Exning Primary school has been established since 1876,Laureate since 1901,Scaltback since 1972 and Newmarket Upper has been established as a comprehensive since 1972. PUPILS:Although the number of pupils fluctuates from term to term there are approximately 980 pupils at the Upper school,400 at Scaltback,160 at Laureate and 90 at Exning. TEACHERS:There are 54 full-time and 3 part-time teachers at the Upper school, 21 full-time teachers at Scaltback,6 full-time and 1 part-time teachers at Laureate.Exning has just 4 full-time and 1 part-time teachers.
